thread.section_title: UPS Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of UPS | www.ups.com
thread.title: Bad Service

author: Bad Service
title: Bad Service
text: Do your job!!! I tracked the delivery progress ALL day it kept saying out for delivery then all of a sudden at 8:09pm, the status change to attempt made but receiver not available! A big lie!!! I was home & NO ONE showed up! Whoever had my package was too lazy to redeliver & just updated the status to go home for the evening! Do you get paid to inconvenience the customer and lie about making a delivery & you did NOT? UPS hire people that actually wants to work!!!
